The Quadratic Formula.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" data-latex="x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}" display="block"><mi data-latex="x">x</mi><mo data-latex="=">=</mo><mfrac data-latex="\frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}"><mrow data-latex="-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}"><mo data-latex="-">−</mo><mi data-latex="b">b</mi><mo data-latex="\pm">±</mo><msqrt data-latex="\sqrt{b^2-4ac}"><msup data-latex="b^2"><mi data-latex="b">b</mi><mn data-latex="2">2</mn></msup><mo data-latex="-">−</mo><mn data-latex="4">4</mn><mi data-latex="a">a</mi><mi data-latex="c">c</mi></msqrt></mrow><mrow data-latex="2a"><mn data-latex="2">2</mn><mi data-latex="a">a</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

Cauchy's Integral Formula.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" data-latex="f(a) = \frac{1}{2\pi i} \oint\frac{f(z)}{z-a}dz" display="block"><mi data-latex="f">f</mi><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="a">a</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mo data-latex="=">=</mo><mfrac data-latex="\frac{1}{2\pi i}"><mn data-latex="1">1</mn><mrow data-latex="2\pi i"><mn data-latex="2">2</mn><mi data-latex="\pi">π</mi><mi data-latex="i">i</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo data-mjx-texclass="OP" data-latex="\oint">∮</mo><mfrac data-latex="\frac{f(z)}{z-a}"><mrow data-latex="f(z)"><mi data-latex="f">f</mi><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="z">z</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow data-latex="z-a"><mi data-latex="z">z</mi><mo data-latex="-">−</mo><mi data-latex="a">a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi data-latex="d">d</mi><mi data-latex="z">z</mi></math>

Angle Sum Formula for Cosines.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" data-latex="\cos(\theta+\phi)=\cos(\theta)\cos(\phi)-\sin(\theta)\sin(\phi) " display="block"><mi data-latex="\cos">cos</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="\theta">θ</mi><mo data-latex="+">+</mo><mi data-latex="\phi">ϕ</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mo data-latex="=">=</mo><mi data-latex="\cos">cos</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="\theta">θ</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mi data-latex="\cos">cos</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="\phi">ϕ</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mo data-latex="-">−</mo><mi data-latex="\sin">sin</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="\theta">θ</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mi data-latex="\sin">sin</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi data-latex="\phi">ϕ</mi><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

Curl of a Vector Field.tex: \vec{\nabla} \times \vec{F} = \left( \frac{\partial F_z}{\partial y} - \frac{\partial F_y}{\partial z} \right) \mathbf{i} + \left( \frac{\partial F_x}{\partial z} - \frac{\partial F_z}{\partial x} \right) \mathbf{j} + \left( \frac{\partial F_y}{\partial x} - \frac{\partial F_x}{\partial y} \right) \mathbf{k}

Standard Deviation.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" data-latex="\sigma = \sqrt{ \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i -\mu)^2} " display="block"><mi data-latex="\sigma">σ</mi><mo data-latex="=">=</mo><msqrt data-latex="\sqrt{ \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i -\mu)^2}"><mfrac data-latex="\frac{1}{N}"><mn data-latex="1">1</mn><mi data-latex="N">N</mi></mfrac><munderover data-latex="\sum_{i=1}^N"><mo data-mjx-texclass="OP" data-latex="\sum">∑</mo><mrow data-mjx-texclass="ORD" data-latex="{i=1}"><mi data-latex="i">i</mi><mo data-latex="=">=</mo><mn data-latex="1">1</mn></mrow><mi data-latex="N">N</mi></munderover><mo data-latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><msub data-latex="x_i"><mi data-latex="x">x</mi><mi data-latex="i">i</mi></msub><mo data-latex="-">−</mo><mi data-latex="\mu">μ</mi><msup data-latex=")^2"><mo data-latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mn data-latex="2">2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>

Definition of Christoffel Symbols.tex: (\nabla_X Y)^k = X^i (\nabla_i Y)^k = X^i \left( \frac{\partial Y^k}{\partial x^i} + \Gamma_{im}^k Y^m \right)
